original_text: because he taught as one who had authority, and not as their teachers of the law.
korean_text: 이는 그 가르치시는 것이 권위 있는 자와 같고 그들의 서기관들과 같지 아니함일러라

sentences.original_text: because he taught as one who had authority
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 권위를 가진 자처럼 가르치셨기 때문에

sentences.original_text: and not as their teachers of the law
